ingredients: 1/2 cup corn kernels, frozen, or fresh (roasted even better!)
1/2 cup canned black beans, drained and rinsed
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
3/4 cup shredded light Mexican cheese blend, divided (or tofu cheese for vegan version)
1 avocado, halved, seeded, peeled and diced
